entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Dome Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow. High minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023
